alert.note: Alert for Attala (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 21 at 7:56PM CDT until July 21 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN LEAKE...SOUTHEASTERN ATTALA AND WESTERN NESHOBA COUNTIES... At 755 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Zama, or 9 miles north of Edinburg, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Edinburg around 825 PM CDT. Pearl River around 845 PM CDT. Philadelphia around 855 PM CDT. Burnside around 900 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Redwater. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
